mapper.update: update tb_shop set sname = #{sname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, scode = #{scode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, slxr = #{slxr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sphone = #{sphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shopcomment = #{shopcomment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shopaddr = #{shopaddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, state = #{state,jdbcType=TINYINT}, created = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated = #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, sname, scode, slxr, sphone, shopcomment, shopaddr, state, created, updated from tb_shop
select group_concat(sname) from tb_shop where id in (${_parameter})

SELECT count(*) from tb_shop where state = 1
AND sname LIKE concat('%', #{sname, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
